title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located in $project/test and we include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the relative path should be preserved.
OB: The BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a new report design in $project/test.
3. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
4. Verify that the relative path is generated and saved correctly.
